bwwExcerpt: For what it's worth - and we're talking millions of dollars here - you are never going to see as convincing an impersonation of a two-dimensional cartoon by a three-dimensional human as that provided by Ethan Slater at the Palace Theater. Mr. Slater plays the title role in 'SpongeBob SquarePants: The Broadway Musical,' the ginormous giggle of a show that opened on Monday night.
